thread.section_title: Adver-T Screen Printing and Embroidery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Adver-T Screen Printing and Embroidery | advertscreenprinting.com
thread.title: Lola
thread.title_full: Adver-T Screen Printing and Embroidery reviewed by Lola

author: Lola
title: Lola
text: Everyone at Adver-T is professional, knowledgeable and friendly. The turn around time for their products is fantastic and their prices are competitive. For me, what stood out the most is the patience received with the back and forth proof process. Any change I submitted, no matter how many times, was honored with no grievances displayed or questions asked. In addition, Brian even caught quantity errors I had overlooked. This indicated to me that he was involved with the ultimate satisfaction of our order. Our facility looks forward to continuing business with such a stellar company.
